title: The Awaken song
body: I'am not sure if this has already been posted but does the song will be avaible on spotify or something like that ? pls

replies.body: You could also just use youtube-dl.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=d17fhhNJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-21T14:36:09.153+0000)
>
> You could also just use youtube-dl.

No.

You could also just read the description of the song on YouTube:

> Listen on:
> Spotify: (Available 1/22)
> Apple Music: (Available 1/22)
> iTunes: (Available 1/22)
> GooglePlay: (Available 1/22)
> Deezer: (Available 1/22)
you could also talk better to people you stupid uneducate morron
No idea about spotify since I dont use it, but Riot always release their songs via their [soundcloud page ](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends)a few days later.

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Faceless,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=d17fhhNJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-21T14:15:54.653+0000)
>
> No idea about spotify since I dont use it, but Riot always release their songs via their [soundcloud page ](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends)a few days later.

there is a lot of there song like the pentakill music on spotify but if they release it only on soundcloud iam fine with it :)
